title: Extend clojure integration tests to cover backing up of contacts and communities
body:
We should increase the coverage of the newly created clojure integration tests.

One of the common use cases is to back up contacts and communities

The test steps that should be covered in the tests should be:

1. Recover multiaccount from seed phrase(already covered by steps) & login (we can start from these steps https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/blob/823fce24570900cd2699fe679867fdf723c13561/src/status_im/integration_test.cljs#L182 or even extend recover-multiaccount-test)

**Seed phrase:** `goddess napkin hint love rather avoid saddle puzzle ghost certain poem buffalo`

3. Check that the communities `Community 1` (created by user), `Community 2` (user joined, open membership type), `Community 3` (user joined, `Require approval` type) and the `Status` community are restored
4. Check that 6 contacts are restored

We want to achieve the closest coverage to what the UI is actually doing.

To simulate in the UI:

1. Recover multiaccount with the seed phrase above
2. Open the home screen and wait up to 2 minutes 
3. Check that the communities appear on the home screen
4. Navigate to the profile > Contacts
5. Check that the contacts are restored
